revised_title: A Neural Network Model of the Vestibulo-Ocular Reflex Using Local Synaptic Learning Rule
tldr: The article presents a neural network model of the vestibulo-ocular reflex, which helps maintain clear vision during head movements. The model uses a local synaptic learning rule and incorporates adaptive features, allowing it to integrate signals and perform eye movements accurately. The network can recover from lesions and hemilabyrinthectomy, and its units carry a variety of combinations of eye position and velocity signals.
